response.overview: Qena is a governorate in Upper Egypt, characterized by a rural look  Those who live in this county are called "Qenawy".  Abdel Elsabour, who hasn’t completed his 20 years yet lives in Upper Egypt, Isolated from the city, trying to create some shots “ Al-Marmah " shows the celebration that takes place in Upper Egypt every year, with horses dancing and jousting, and he lives in a struggle between his village mores and the cultural openness of his generation. He travels from city to another just to watch cinema" movie", he goes out at night well dressed, hears rap and go skateboarding, as he feels alienated in his village because he is different and his dream is to be a cinematographer studying aboard.
response.title: QENAWY

results.name: Qenawy  Short film official trailer - الإعلان الرسمي للفيلم القصير قناوي
